channel.title: 508 customs and client
channel.description: 1. there is death cape, inferno adze, statius warhammer added to my client. but when i try to wear them.... i am not able to wear it... and when i check my server... it say unsupported item (itemid). anyone care to help? 2. i added donators cape a while ago and when i wear it my character becomes invincible and i used the int's from death cape and change the drop models and stuff... 3. how do i add special attacks for vesta spear, longsword, statius warhammer, morrigans throwaxe and javelin.... 4.can someone give me the right stats for all spirit sheilds and PvP Weapons and Armours? please!

item.title: 508 customs and client
item.dc:creator: @bo_3wais bo 3wais
item.description:
@bo_3wais wrote:

[quote=“sonicforce41, post:1, topic:312307”]1. there is death cape, inferno adze, statius warhammer added to my client. but when i try to wear them… i am not able to wear it… and when i check my server… it say unsupported item (itemid). anyone care to help?
2. i added donators cape a while ago and when i wear it my character becomes invincible and i used the int’s from death cape and change the drop models and stuff…
3. how do i add special attacks for vesta spear, longsword, statius warhammer, morrigans throwaxe and javelin…
4.can someone give me the right stats for all spirit sheilds and PvP Weapons and Armours? please![/quote]

  1. go to equipment, search were it says capes, ull find like “cape”, “somethin”, “Etc” put the item name there with them, the item will be usable after the compile
    2.wrong model?
    3.not sure
  2. theres no real “stats” usually ppl just put wut they think is enuf =p

Read full topic

item.title: 508 customs and client
item.dc:creator: @ballin2005 ballin2005
item.description:
@ballin2005 wrote:

Wrong section.

  1. Change the ID’S to something you can actually wear. Maybe bronze items?
  2. Did you add the model #'s?
  3. Go look around, you’ll find a tutorial, hopefully.
  4. Go look at the Runescape website for the real bonuses or any fan site.

Clean up your post it degrades the hell out of private server developers.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @DMX DMX
item.description:
@DMX wrote:

I’m not familiar to 508s but did you add the models like “add model ####” ingame?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 03, 2009, 12:09:34 pm[/size][hr]If you did that then next add the ints.
